scripts.loadschema:postgres: if [ $TEST_SUITE = 'seneca-postgres-store' ]; then psql -U postgres -f seneca-postgres-store/docker/dbschema.sql ; fi
scripts.verify: cd ./$TEST_SUITE/ && npm i && npm install https://github.com/senecajs/seneca$SENECA_VER && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run clone && npm run loadschema && npm run verify
